inclusion.criterion: psychotherapy at the Psychology Department Clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to understand the nature of the study and able to provide written informed consent prior to conduct of any study procedures.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to communicate in English with study personnel
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: For women of child-bearing potential (i.e., one who is biologically capable of becoming pregnant), must be willing to use a medically acceptable form of birth control or practice abstinence for the duration of her participation in the trial.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any of the following diagnoses, as identified by the intake evaluation conducted or study assessments:
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: A diagnosis claustrophobia severe enough that it would impair ability to be in the Heckel HT3000 hyperthermia device
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: A current (or within 12 months prior to the Screening visit) diagnosis of Anorexia Nervosa or Bulimia Nervosa
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a medical condition or disorder that: Is unstable and clinically significant, or: Could interfere with the accurate assessment of safety or efficacy of treatment, including:
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: individuals who are using prescription drugs that may impair thermoregulatory cooling, including diuretics, barbiturates, and beta-blockers, or antihistamines
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: individuals with cardiovascular conditions or problems (uncontrolled hypertension, congestive heart failure, or documented evidence of coronary artery disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: individuals with chronic conditions/diseases associated with a reduced ability to initiate thermoregulatory cooling, including Parkinson's, multiple sclerosis, central nervous system tumors, and diabetes with neuropathy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: individuals with a fever the day of study intervention
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: individuals with recent acute joint injury
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: individuals with enclosed infections, be they dental, in joints, or in any other tissues
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has CLL and large cell transformation. He has had multiple treatments for his disease, including FCR therapy, PCR, R-CVP, and Campath therapy. However, he did not have a significant response to these treatments and was switched to different regimens. He currently has an enlarging left cervical node which was biopsied and found to have Richter's transformation.
